channel.title: Just A Groove
channel.itunes:subtitle: The best in eclectic, quality sounds worldwide.
channel.itunes:author: Jay Simon

item.title: Julien Love - Love is Love
item.description: Tracklist: 1. Black Moon - Buck Em Down (Inst Feat Mary J Blidge) 2. Main Source - Looking At The Front Door (Inst) 3. Pete Rock - Searching (Inst) 4. Shanice - It's For You (Inst) 5. Tribe Called Quest - Electronic Relaxation (Inst) 6. Ini - Fakin Jax (Inst) 7. Adriana Evans - Seein' is Believing (Inst) 8. Bahamadia - Uknowhowwedu (Inst) 9. De La Soul - Breakadawn (Inst) 10. Mobb Deep - Temperature's Rising (Inst Feat Marvin Gaye) 11. Group Home - Supa Dupa Star (Inst) 12. Ill Skratch - Where My Homiez (Inst)a 13. Common - I Used To Love H.E.R (Inst) 14. De La Soul - Stakes Is High (Inst) Theo Parrish - A Chunk Of Sugar (Inst) Guest mix from my man Julien Love. Hip-hop soul n what not.
item.dc:creator: Jay Simon

Tracklist:

item.title: Just a Groove 12-23-2011
item.description: Tracklist: 1. Vince Guaraldi Trio - Christmas Time is Here (Instrumental) 2. Floating Points - Myrtle Avenue [Eglo] 3. Space Dimension Controller - Flight of the Escape Vessels [R&S] 4. Erdbeerschnitzel - Same Same [3rd Strike] 5. Carlos Nilmnns - From Sunset To Twilight [Ornaments] 6. Vakula - JVM (A Tribute to Dope Pop) [Leleka] 7. El Kid - Hypnosis (Terekke & Steve Summers Live Edit) [CDR] 8. Unknown Artist - Frankfurt Sessions 1 [Sex Tags Mania] 9. Funkineven - Fuck Off [Apron] 10. Reel By Real - Switchback [Mojuba] Not a best of 2011, just some good jams I've yet to play on the show. Hope you feel it.
item.dc:creator: Jay Simon
item.itunes:summary:
Tracklist:
1. Vince Guaraldi Trio - Christmas Time is Here (Instrumental) 2. Floating Points - Myrtle Avenue [Eglo] 3. Space Dimension Controller - Flight of the Escape Vessels [R&S] 4. Not a best of 2011, just some good jams I've yet to play on the show. Hope you feel it.

item.title: Just a Groove 10-21-2011
item.description: Tracklist: 1. Mankunku Quartet - Dedication (To Daddy Trane and Brother Shorter) [World Record Co.] 2. Soft Machine - Virtually Pt. 4 [CBS] 3. Can - One More Night [United Artists] 4. Richard Schneider Jr. - Samba Trip [Harvest/EMI] 5. Larry Carlton - Wavin' & Smilin' [Blue Thumb] 6. Flowers - For Real [LA Xpressio] 7. Darwin's Theory - Keep On Smiling [Lotus Land] 8. Junei - Let's Ride [Pharaohs] 9. Maximum Joy - Searching For a Feeling (LP Version) [Y Records] 10. A Certain Ratio - Shack Up [Factory Benelux] 11. Bush Tetras - Moonlite [ROIR] 12. Singers & Players - Devious Woman [99 Records] 13. Barrington Levy - Teacher [MCA] So many jams... On a side note...I occasionally post mixes I do for other shows on my Soundcloud page, which you can check here: http://www.soundcloud.com/jaysimon If there is no mix on here..there might be one there ;)

item.title: Just a Groove 7-22-2011
item.description: Tracklist: 1. Likwid Biskit - Sound Orgy [People] 2. Thundercat - Boat Cruise [Brainfeeder] 3. Miles Bonny - Same Dream Again Ft. Ahu [Melting Pot Music] 4. Dennis Coffey - All Your Goodies Are Gone Ft. Mayer Hawthorne (Shigeto Remix) [Strut] 5. Erdbeerschnitzel - Wait [CDR] 6. Floating Points - Marilyn [Eglo] 7. Falty DL - Make It Difficult [All City] 8. Vakula - Picture of You [Dekmantel] 9. Marcellus Pittman - By Your Side [Lifetime Groove] 10. Moodymann - Shine [Peacefrog] Bunch of ill tunes for yall...Some new shit from Thundercat, Erdbeerschnitzel, Marecellus Pittman...etc. From the UK to Detroit to Brooklyn...keepin it worldwide and FRESH. Also grab the free DL of the Dennis Coffey remixes here! http://www.denniscoffey-thealbum.com/Re-Worked/
item.dc:creator: Jay Simon
item.itunes:summary:

1. Likwid Biskit - Sound Orgy [People] 2. Thundercat - Boat Cruise [Brainfeeder] 3. Miles Bonny - Same Dream Again Ft. Ahu [Melting Pot Music] 4. Dennis Coffey - All Your Goodies Are Gone Ft. Mayer Hawthorne (Shigeto Remix) [Strut] 5. Erdbeerschnitzel - Wait [CDR] 6. Floating Points - Marilyn [Eglo] 7. Falty DL - Make It Difficult [All City] 8. Vakula - Picture of You [Dekmantel] 9. Bunch of ill tunes for yall...Some new shit from Thundercat, Erdbeerschnitzel, Marecellus Pittman...etc. From the UK to Detroit to Brooklyn...keepin it worldwide and FRESH. Also grab the free DL of the Dennis Coffey remixes here! http://www.denniscoffey-thealbum.com/Re-Worked/

item.title: Just a Groove 7-8-2011
item.description: Tracklist: 1. A Tribe Called Quest - 4 Moms [Jive] 2. Fatima - Mind [Eglo] 3. Justin Timberlake - Want You To Know Ft. Vanessa Marquez [CDR] 4. Dego - We Are Virgo Ft. Kaidi Tatham [2000Black] 5. Lord Echo - Wang East [CDR] 6. Mim Suleiman - Bibi Na Mpu [Running Back] 7. First Touch - Toe Jammin [Highsteppin'] 8. Gwen Guthrie - Seventh Heaven [4th & Broadway] 9. Savanna - Never Let You Go [R & B] 10. Pittsburgh Track Authority - Duskhaped (With Nice Rec)[Uzuri] 11. Vakula - Bannie M_02 [CDR] 12. Iron Curtis - Stumbled Across [Retreat] 100th episode!!! So glad to keep doing this show and bringing you guys great music through time and space. Lots of different styles this show, new cuts from Dego, Fatima, and Vakula, and a whole lot more!
item.dc:creator: Jay Simon
item.itunes:summary:
Tracklist:

100th episode!!! So glad to keep doing this show and bringing you guys great music through time and space. Lots of different styles this show, new cuts from Dego, Fatima, and Vakula, and a whole lot more!

item.title: Ben Sun - Just a Groove Voyeurhythm Guest Mix 6-10-2011
item.description: Tracklist: 1. (Lil Louis skit) 2. Sa-Ra Creative Partners - My Lady [Jazzy Sport] 3. Yasuko Agawa - L.A. Night [Invitation] 4. The Emotions - You've Got the Right to Know [CBS] 5. WAR - The World is a Ghetto [United Artists] 6. Maxmillion Dunbar - Piano & Dream World [Future Times] 7. DJ Nature - Everyone [Golf Channel] 8. Larry Heard - Missing You [Alleviated] 9. Anton Zap - PM Please [Underground Quality] 10. Instant House - I'm Free [Natural Resource] 11. Kool Vibe - Deep Inside (Brawther's 7inch Of Dub Edit) [My Love Is Underground] 12. Moodymann - Yesterdays [Soul City] 13. Master At Work - I Can't get No Sleep [Feel The Rhythm] 14. Gino Soccio - It's Alright [Strut] 15. Platinum Pied Pipers - Open Your Eyes [Ubiquity] Guest mix from my man Benjamin Sun! Representing Voyeurhythm records from the UK...enjoy.

item.title: Just a Groove 4-1-2011
item.description: Tracklist: 1. Dirty - Ride (Maxmillion Dunbar Fix) [CDR] 2. James Pants - Every Night [Stones Throw] 3. Fudge Fingas - What Do You Do [Prime Numbers] 4. Tom Trago - Space Balloon [Rush Hour] 5. FaltyDL - Brazil Ft. Lily Mackenzie [Planet Mu] 6. Mizz Beats - The Day Before Tomorrow [Eglo] 7. Lone - Approaching Rainbow [R&S] 8. Parallel Dance Ensemble - Shopping Cart [Permanent Vacation] 9. Dorian - Natsu No Owari Ft. G.Rina [Felicity] 10. Ilija Rudman - Romance Warrior [Bear Funk] 11. Blue Feather - High Up to the Sky [Mercury] 12. Serge Ponsar - Lifetime [Warner Bros.] 13. Cindy - Must Be Lucky [Funhouse] All types of jams today...from futuristic deep house cuts, to Japanese boogie. Peep!

item.title: Just a Groove 3-18-2011
item.description: Tracklist: 1. Austin Peralta - The Underwater Mountain Odyssey [Brainfeeder] 2. Mayer Hawthorne - Thin Moon [Stones Throw] 3. Molly Wagger - Weekend [Tirk] 4. Radiohead - Separator [White] 5. Bibio - Artists' Valley [Warp] 6. Toro Y Moi - New Beat [Carpark] 7. Harvey Presents Locussolus - Next To You [International Feel] 8. Duffstep - Your Touch(Mark E Remix) [Join the Dots] 9. Deep Space Orchestra - Moonrunners [Winding Road] 10. Zepp - Dearly Beloved (DJ Nature Remix) [Delusions of Grandeur] Been too long...back with some heat. Jazz, Rock, Soul, Disco, House...etc.
item.dc:creator: Jay Simon
item.itunes:summary:
Tracklist:

Been too long...back with some heat. Jazz, Rock, Soul, Disco, House...etc.

Romanthony (Gigolo Jazz Remix) [Vinylmania] Lots of nice stuff today...unintentionally no tracks later than 1996. Jazz-funk to some r&b gems, to soulful house classics...enjoy.

item.title: Jay Simon - How Jay Do
item.description: Tracklist: 1. Erdbeerschnitzel - To An End [Mirau] 2. Mark E - Special FX [Merc] 3. Funkaholic - It's Me Myself and My Day Ft. Steve Hartley [Boogie Bash] 4. Blacklodge - Lay It On the Line [Lazy Days] 5. SE62 - Wall Ride (Eddie C Remix) [Home Taping Is Killing Music] 6. San Soda - NMBsucks [We Play House] 7. Tornado Wallace - Paddlin' (Linkwood Remix) [Delusions of Grandeur] 8. Alphabet City - Lowdown [Traveller] 9. Kaine Ft. Kathy Diamond - Love Saves the Day (Mario Basanov Vocal Remix) [Needwant] 10. Kasper Bjørke - Heaven (Muzzle Flash Remix) [HFN] 11. Bot.Ox - Blue Steel (Azari & III Remix) [I'm a Cliché] 12. Muallem - Holland Tunnel [Compost Black Label] 13. Arto Mwambe - Duster FC (12" Studio Mix) [Live At Robert Johnson] 14. Ibex - Mystery Babylon [Yore] I know it's been a grueling 3 weeks since we last spoke, but there's no need to worry. I'm back with a mix, and I'm giving you more of what you're funkin' for. Modern disco, deep house, boogie vibes...and some other shit thrown in there for good measure.

item.title: a-groove - u can disco too

Tensnake - Holding Back (My Love) [Running Back] 4. Daniel Wang - Black Boots & Sine Waves [Environ] 5. Dølle Jølle - Balearic Incarnation [Permanent Vacation] 6. Sorcerer - Hawaiian Island [Tirk] 7.
